main event: Report of a satellite sighting from a British vessel employed by the United Fruit Company in the Gulf of Mexico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes., The object displayed unusual characteristics, including a reddish glow., It appeared stationary for several minutes before making rapid, erratic movements., The object reached an altitude of approximately 50,000 feet before disappearing., The witnesses noted that the object did not resemble any known satellite or aircraft.
sighted object: a strange object observed in the sky, appeared to be a satellite
witness description: crew aboard the M.V. British vessel employed by the United Fruit Company
